title: Dessiner un nouveau départ (Drawing a New Beginning)
itunes:title: Dessiner un nouveau départ (Drawing a New Beginning)
description:
Berthet One always loved drawing, but never saw a future in it. Until he wound up in prison and realized that drawing was the best chance he had at rebuilding his life.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3H40yhC.
